descriptionHtml:
I

Arianne the Witcher
Has joined forces with the Dragonborn to hunt down Monsters

Her strengths, Onehanded weapons,Alteration,Destruction,Sneak

Her level starts at 10 and levels up to 150
Uses storm and alteration spells and is pretty decent with a sword
Ideal for Monster hunting

Some of her Spells/Perks,Oakflesh,Lightning bolt,Ward spells,Savage strike,Critical charge,Stealth
Fast healing,Dual flurry,Light foot,Bladesman,Hack and slash,Ranger,Quickshot,Mage armor
Class, Combat Nightblade, Marriable CBBE

Location falkreath deadmans drink

[youtube]CGGr1XfB4Ls[/youtube]
Video by conradliebers/ SplitztikzGaming


Recomend Thieves Guild Armor HD revival by redtoxOr Thieves Guild Duelist Armor CBBEv3 Echo by Echo 1162
For the full Monster hunting look

Inspired by Smokey the cat
